document.full_text: a suicide attack on an army recruitment center in northern afghanistan killed at least 37 people on monday, the third major assault in the area in less than a month, the deputy governor said.
document.title: suicide attack on afghan army center kills at least 37
lines_and_colors: a suicide attack on an army recruitment center in northern afghanistan killed at least 37 people on monday, the third major assault in the area in less than a month, the deputy governor said.
